jot.io.data.format

Class ColladaScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.io.data.format.ColladaScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericFormat

    public class ColladaScene
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericFormat
    Class that implements a Collada 1.4.1 specification file parser, i.e., scene loader. Only supports geometries, effects, materials, visualSceneNodes, and images/textures.
    Author:
    Gon√ßalo Amador & Abel Gomes

      • load

        public static ColladaScene load(java.lang.String fileName)
                         throws LoaderException
        Load the data, i.e., textures, geometry colors, etc., of a Collada file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the path/name of the Collada file content to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded data of a Collada file.
        Throws:
        LoaderException - if the file cannot be read.

      • loadFormat

        public static TransformGroup loadFormat(java.lang.String filePath,
                                        java.lang.String fileName,
                                        float scale,
                                        AbstractBoundingVolume.BoundingVolumeType boundingVolumeType)
        Load the data, i.e., textures, geometry colors, etc., of a Collada file, and encapsulate it into a transformGroup.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to load.
        fileName - the name of the file content to load.
        scale - the scale of this model.
        boundingVolumeType - the type of BoundingVolume that must engulf this model.
        Returns:
        the loaded data of a Collada file encapsulated into a transformGroup.

               throws java.io.IOException,
                      LoaderException
        Description copied from interface: GenericFormat
        Parse a generic format file.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        fileName - the path/name of the file to parse.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file does not exit.
        LoaderException - if the file can't be read.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string with all the keys for geometries, effects, materials, and nodes. Each key set corresponds is separated by an line break.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string that contains all the geometries names, followed by all the effects names, followed by all materials names, follows by all nodes names.
